name: Synthetic Civilian
description:
Story:

One of these civilians isn't real! You are an FBI agent tasked with exterminating a rouge AI. This robot has the ability to mimic the appearance and behaviors of all other civilians! It's trying to blend into those around It so that you're unable to find it, and it's your job to figure out who the robot is and annihilate it without killing any of the other civilians.

How To Play:

Playing the game is very simple! All you have to do is click on the person you believe to be the robot. If it is not the robot, a life will be deducted, but if it is the robot, you will proceed to the next level!

The robot looks and behaves just like any other civilian, but he does have some cues to let you know which is it! (List of cues below)

Cues:

- Sparks fly off the robot

- Robot's eyes turn different colors ( for a short period of time)

- Robot scales to be larger ( for a short period of time)

- Robot becomes stiff and doesn't play their animations

- Stays perfectly still for a prolonged period of time

- Moves in one direction for a prolonged period of time

- Moves back and forth between 2 points for a prolonged period of time

- The robot will never give off an emotion

PEOPLE:

Coder / Artist: NovaKnight

Main Composer: Glerg

Music Help: Curruff
